content: I'm curious what kind of tolerance for noise the perf suite has. @pnkfelix triaged https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/90490, but I would not expect that PR to have any effect on the compiler (and my understanding is that rustc-perf uses nightly cargo, so there should be 0 impact). Is there a threshold under which it ignores? Is it common for small fluctuations to be reported between runs?
https://github.com/rust-lang/rustc-perf/blob/master/docs/comparison-analysis.md#what-makes-a-test-result-significant and other docs in there are probably helpful for this question
but in the particular case, not sure
